column2: Receiving stolen property is defined as receiving possession and control of stolen property, known to have been stolen by another person, with the intent to permanently deprive the original owner of his interest in the property

Larceny is defined as the taking and carrying away of the tangible personal property of another without consent with the extent to permanently deprive the original owner of his interest in the property.
Larceny by Trick is defined as larceny where the defendant obtains possession of the property via misrepresentation.
